title: Southeast Asian consumers spend $3.7 billion on bubble tea beverages annually
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Bubble tea connoisseurs in Southeast Asia spend $3.66 billion a year on the beverage and its many variants, a new study jointly conducted by Singapore tech venture enabler Momentum Works and digital payments firm Qlub found. The largest market by
